name: [WIP] Browser-default HTML form controls UI kit (Chromium)
description:
A UI kit of basic HTML styles and form controls. This uses Chrome's version of the built-in form controls on Chromium browsers. This theme is based on the collaborative work of teams from Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome.


Do you find this useful? Support my work ➔


———

*This is a work in progress. Come back to check for improvements and updates.


Got feedback? Help me make this more useful for everyone by sending me messages via the Friends of Figma Slack workspace or Twitter DMs!
